headlines.description: AC Milan had a goal chalked off by VAR, missed an open goal, were foiled by the goalkeeper and twice hit the woodwork in a draw against Sassuolo.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milan do everything but score in crazy draw

headlines.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice to set yet another coring landmark and help Juventus to a 3-1 home win over Udinese.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo sets new goals record as Juve go top

headlines.description: AS Roma launched a second-half comeback to beat Serie A's bottom side SPAL 3-1 at the Stadio Olimpico on Sunday and move into the top four.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roma go fourth with comeback win over bottom club SPAL

headlines.description: Inter Milan returned to the top of Serie A with a 1-1 draw at Fiorentina on Sunday but were denied victory by a superb late Dusan Vlahovic equaliser
headlines.shortLinkText: Inter go top despite brilliant late Fiorentina equaliser
